column4: Hi, I need help setting up sendmail, I have a wrt-54g router and I'm using road runner.. it looks like RR must be blocking my ports... anyone have a link to a decent tutorial or willing to help?
Hi, I need help setting up sendmail, I have a wrt-54g router and I'm using road runner.. it looks like RR must be blocking my ports... anyone have a link to a decent tutorial or willing to help?
I hope RR is blocking it save me a lot of spam, but search for "sendmail smart host"
and postfix may be more of your liking
